'''Cute Doll''' is an item in the [[Rag and Bone Shop]]. It's only listed during {{Quest|Game of the Rich}} after [[Lanoire]] has finished shopping, but is sold out and can't be purchased.

==Trivia==
* The icon for this item strongly resembles the event-exclusive [[Furnishing]] {{Item|Mt. Yougou Night Walk Red Kitsune Doll}} that was obtainable from {{Quest|Pen Pals, Book Reviews, and the Super Lucky General}}.
